title: Federal funds outside of state treasury
context: [ยง201H-17] Federal funds outside of state treasury. Notwithstanding chapter 38, the corporation may establish and manage federal funds outside of the state treasury to be used for federal housing programs. The corporation shall invest those funds in permitted investments in accordance with chapter 36. [L 2005, c 196, pt of ยง20; am L 2006, c 180, ยง15]
